=== Summary ===
It would be nice if Ubuntu-be.org would be present at the Flemish education days (<nowiki>[[http://www.vlod.be/|VLOD]]</nowiki>) in Ghent. Please ask questions about this activity to the ubuntu-be.org mailing list. We also want to thank linux-service.be for the donation of the booth on this fair.

=== Schedule ===
The fair (week 10):
* Monday 5 march 2007
* Tuesday 6 march 2007
* Wednesday 7 march 2007
* Thursday 8 march 2007

=== Planning ===
* Week 1-5: contact people that have experience with FS in schools. Start looking for bundles.
* Week 5: We get to know if we can do the workshop, boost the work.
* Week 5-8: Look for possibility and think of ideas and work for them.
* Week 8 (Begin): Decide what we will do actually, write it up.
* Week 8: Communicate on some mailing lists that we will be present at VLOD, like on vrijesoftware.klascement.be
* Week 8-9: Prepare last things
* Week 1-10: Find people that want to help & look for sponsors

=== Workshop ===
The workshop will be on Monday from 10 to 11 o'clock. It will be organised in a half open room.

==== Ideas ====
* Invite someone from ubuntu to talk at the workshop? Ask Richard?
* Do a demo about thin clients
* Look for people with real experience with edubuntu en FS?
* Make a bundle with some example of free software in the classroom.
** Create a list of the use of opensource in belgium: <nowiki>[[BelgianTeam/VLOD_2007/SchoolsUsingFOSS]]</nowiki>
* Make a bundle about free software education.
